name: unsprayed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unsprayed areas or crops have not had chemicals spread over them in small drops: Field margins were left unsprayed. They sell their beautiful unsprayed peaches at the local market. Related word
spray verb
More examplesFewer examplesSamples were taken in two unsprayed fields.Spiders were abundant in the unsprayed plots.Treatments were replicated four times and an unsprayed control plot was included. It was hard to find unsprayed, organically grown fruit and vegetables.Weeds were left unsprayed until after the breeding season.I don't eat the peel unless the fruit is unsprayed.
